word_mean: 〔复endometria〕子宫内膜：子宫内粘膜的厚度与结构随月经周期而变化。功能上可分为三层：基底层、海绵层与致密层，后两层形成机能层

sentence.Network_en: The endometrium and its fluids play a major role in the reproductive process.
sentence.Network_cn: 子宫内膜及其液体在生殖过程中起着重要作用.

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To develop a method for in vitro reconstruction of human endometrium.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要目的探讨体外构建人子宫内膜的新方法.

sentence.Network_en: If you don't stimulate the endometrium, you don't get any bleeding.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果子宫内膜没有受到活化, 就根本不会发生出血事件.

list.abs: ...子宫腔以外存在有功能的子宫内膜腺体和基质，即相对于在位内膜（eutopic endometrium）存在的异位内膜( ectopic endometrium)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from endo- 'within' + Greek mētra 'womb'

means.word_mean: 1. (pregnancy) the mucous membrane that lines the uterus; thickens under hormonal control and (if pregnancy does not occur) is shed in menstruation; if pregnancy occurs it is shed along with the placenta at parturition
